title: Requirements Gathering for Immersive VR Theater Platform
description: Gather and document project requirements from stakeholders, including functional, non-functional, and technical requirements. This task will also involve researching best practices for immersive VR theater experiences to ensure the platform meets user expectations, focusing on areas such as user experience, performance optimization, accessibility, and security.

title: Design Architecture
description: Create a high-level design architecture for the VR platform, detailing components such as user interface, server, networking, and hardware requirements.

title: User Interface Design
description: Design intuitive and immersive user interfaces for the VR platform, considering factors like usability, accessibility, and aesthetics.

title: Server Implementation
description: Develop the server-side components of the VR platform, including handling user requests, managing resources, and ensuring data persistence.

title: Networking Implementation
description: Implement the networking components for the VR platform, ensuring seamless communication between devices and minimal latency.

title: Hardware Selection
description: Research and select appropriate hardware for the VR platform, including headsets, controllers, and any other necessary components.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Combine the various components of the VR platform and test them for functionality, performance, and usability.

title: Deployment Strategy Development
description: Develop a deployment strategy for the VR platform, including planning for staging environments, rollout schedules, and contingency plans.

title: Deploy to Staging Environment
description: Deploy the VR platform to a staging environment for final testing and refinement.

title: Prepare Launch Announcement
description: Prepare marketing materials and announce the launch of the Immersive VR Theater to the public.
